__help_experimental_mode: set to true if you just looking for a 'quick and dirty model'
__help_pre_trained_embedding: set to true if you want to use a pre-trained embedding, otherwise the model will learn the embedding
__help_embedding_algorithm: the only supported embedding for now
__help_embedding_dimension: possible embedding dimensions are [50, 100, 200, 300] any other value will be replaced by 100
__help_eval_model_name: algorithm to be evaluated, possible values are 'rnn' or 'tfidf'. application will exit if another value
